column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////With every entree you get to upgrade to premium pancakes
column2: I defiantly recommend this since they are substantial and delicious. The location cannot be beat
column3: it's directly next to Millennium Park on Michigan Avenue. Be prepared to wait
column4: wait and wait. The seating situation inside and outside needs to be worked on. When you sit inside it sounds like you're sitting in a children's cafeteria and outside they need more umbrella's.
